wt.cache

Class MasterICacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.StandardMBean
      • wt.jmx.core.StandardMBean
        • wt.jmx.core.SelfAwareMBean
          • wt.cache.MasterICacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.management.DynamicMBean, javax.management.MBeanRegistration, javax.management.NotificationBroadcaster, javax.management.NotificationEmitter, MasterICacheManagerMBean, BaseObjectNamed, SelfEmailingMBean

    public class MasterICacheManager
extends SelfAwareMBean
implements MasterICacheManagerMBean, javax.management.NotificationEmitter
    Implements the MasterICacheManagerMBean management interface in the straight-forward way.

    Supported API: true

    Extendable: true

      • clearAllCaches

        public void clearAllCaches()
        Description copied from interface: MasterICacheManagerMBean
        Clears all entries from all ICacheManagerClassic-managed caches.

        Warning: Running this operation on an in-use system can cause significant disruptions.

        Supported API: true

        Specified by:
